fields.summary: [Frontend] Migration Selector Screen Jira to Azure DevOps

content.text: dynamically select a Jira project and an Azure DevOps project
, configure migration options, and submit the migration request so that
I can migrate the necessary project data between Jira and Azure DevOps
, dynamically populated by fetching from the backend.
displayed next to the project name.
Each Azure DevOps project has an
displayed next to the project name.
(All selected by default, users can deselect them.)
that submits the migration request and triggers the backend process.
The UI makes a request to fetch Jira projects and populates the dropdown.
If the request fails, an error message is displayed.
The UI requests Azure DevOps projects and populates the dropdown with
If the request fails, an error message is displayed.

{
  "jiraProjectId": "101",
  "azureProjectId": "d7a1f9b5-3c64-4b0d-bc14-87a2b1c2d8f9",
  "scope": {
    "customFields": true,
    "screens": true,
    "issueTypes": true,
    "workflows": true,
    "issues": true,
    "comments": true,
    "testCases": true,
    "testPlans": true
  }
}
If successful, a success message is displayed.
If failed, an error message is shown.
